title: Deepti Sharma's Hat-Trick Heroics Power UP Warriorz to Thrilling One-Run Win Over Delhi Capitals in WPL 2024
content: Deepti Sharma's all-round brilliance was the difference as UP Warriorz snatched a thrilling one-run victory against Delhi Capitals in the Women's Premier League 2024. Sharma's incredible hat-trick in the 19th over, the first by an Indian in WPL history, turned the tide of the match. Earlier, she had also struck a crucial half-century, ensuring a fighting total of 138/8 for UP Warriorz. Despite a solid half-century from Delhi captain Meg Lanning, who also claimed the Orange Cap, the Capitals fell short of the target, with Titas Sadhu being run out on the penultimate ball. This was also the lowest total defended successfully in the WPL, highlighting the incredible fight put up by the UP Warriorz.
author: Scroll Staff
